title: How to Fix Unresponsive TCL Roku TV Remote: 7 Quick Tips

steps.title: Make sure the batteries are still working.
steps.content: Make sure the batteries are still working. It's recommended to use new batteries, so you'll know they have a fresh charge. Check that the batteries are oriented properly in the compartment.

steps.title: Turn the TV off completely and turn it on again.
steps.content: Turn the TV off completely and turn it on again. Use the physical button to turn off your TV, and then unplug it from the outlet. Wait at least 30 seconds, and then plug it back in again.

steps.title: Check the IR emitter.
steps.content: Check the IR emitter. On a Roku, this light is purple and can be seen in a dark room. You can also use your smartphone's camera or a digital camera to check Point the remote at your camera and hold the Power button. On your camera, check for a colored light coming from the remote. If you don't see a light, the remote is most likely defective.

steps.title: Make sure nothing is blocking the TV's IR sensor.
steps.content: Make sure nothing is blocking the TV's IR sensor. This is the Infra-Red light sensor at the center bottom of your TV. If you have something blocking it, such as the router or a console, move it elsewhere.

steps.title: Hold the remote in front of the sensor.
steps.content: Hold the remote in front of the sensor. The IR signal may go undetected if you're too far. If the remote only works up close, you may need to get a replacement with a stronger signal.

steps.title: Pair your remote again.
steps.content: Pair your remote again. If you have an enhanced remote, you can find a pairing button in the battery compartment. [1] X Research source Remove the battery compartment. Find the button on the bottom-right of the battery compartment. Press and hold the button for 3 seconds. The LED on the left will start flashing. Restart your TV. Wait for the TV to recognize the remote.

steps.title: Buy a replacement.
steps.content: Buy a replacement. If all else fails, you'll need to get a new remote. You can buy a remote for any Roku TV model from the Roku website . You can also contact Roku on their website .
